name: Small Town Murder
description:
While passing through a small town, you're faced with... a murder. Find out who murdered the king and be the town's hero.

It's really short and it has no sound, but I think it's pretty good for my first game ever on Unity. This jam was really fun and it was a great experience. I learned a ton and now I know what I need to work on. I posted my messy, disorganized Unity project folder as well, so you can take a look at it and tell me what I can improve and what I could fix.

I'm pretty sure the game has a few bugs or sequence skips in there ;-;
